headline: Techman Robot Unveils High-Speed AI Inspection Solution at iREX 2025, Driving a "Zero Downtime" Quality Revolution
summary: Techman Robot, a global leader in smart robotics, has announced a significant leap in manufacturing efficiency at the International Robot Exhibition (iREX) 2025 held at Tokyo Big Sight. Under the theme "AI Instant Decision, Seamless Productivity Upgrade," the company unveiled its High-Speed AI Flying Trigger Inspection and breakthrough "Auto AI Training" technology, signaling a new era of zero-downtime, high-efficiency production.

content.title: Techman Robot Unveils High-Speed AI Inspection Solution at iREX 2025, Driving a "Zero Downtime" Quality Revolution

thumbnail.caption: Techman Robot launches its High-Speed AI Inspection Solution at iREX 2025, delivering up to 50% efficiency gains.

headline: Anthropic plans an IPO as early as 2026, FT reports
summary: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet's Google and Amazon.com, has hired the law firm Wilson Sonsini to prepare for an initial ​public offering that could take place as early as 2026, the Financial Times ‌reported on Tuesday.  An IPO would give the company, which operates the AI chatbot Claude, a more efficient way to ‌raise capital and provide leverage for bigger acquisitions through public stock.  The company ⁠has previously turned to Wilson Sonsini ‌for a range of corporate matters.

content.title: Anthropic plans an IPO as early as 2026, FT reports
content.summary: Anthropic, the artificial intelligence startup backed by Alphabet's Google and Amazon.com, has hired the law firm Wilson Sonsini to prepare for an initial ​public offering that could take place as early as 2026, the Financial Times ‌reported on Tuesday.  An IPO would give the company, which operates the AI chatbot Claude, a more efficient way to ‌raise capital and provide leverage for bigger acquisitions through public stock.  The company ⁠has previously turned to Wilson Sonsini ‌for a range of corporate matters.

headline: Asian shares are mixed as steady bond yields, rebound for bitcoin push US stocks higher
summary: Asian shares were mixed Wednesday after stocks on Wall Street held steadier as both bond yields and bitcoin stabilized.  U.S. futures rose and oil prices edged higher.  Tokyo's Nikkei 225 jumped 1.6% to 50,063.65 on big gains for technology shares like Tokyo Electron, which jumped 5.6%.

content.title: Asian shares are mixed as steady bond yields, rebound for bitcoin push US stocks higher
content.summary: Asian shares were mixed Wednesday after stocks on Wall Street held steadier as both bond yields and bitcoin stabilized.  U.S. futures rose and oil prices edged higher.  Tokyo's Nikkei 225 jumped 1.6% to 50,063.65 on big gains for technology shares like Tokyo Electron, which jumped 5.6%.

thumbnail.caption: A person on a bicycle waits in front of an electronic stock board showing Japan's Nikkei index at a securities firm Monday, Dec. 1, 2025, in Tokyo. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko)

headline: The Bull Case For Digital Realty Trust (DLR) Could Change Following Massive India AI Data Center Push
summary: Recently, Digital Realty Trust revealed a joint venture with Reliance Industries and Brookfield Corporation to invest US$11.00 billion in AI-focused data capacity in Andhra Pradesh, India, alongside a US$373.00 million power equipment supply agreement with Schneider Electric and an expanded AI infrastructure collaboration with NVIDIA in Northern Virginia. Together, these moves suggest Digital Realty is working to secure key power equipment, hyperscale partners, and AI workloads across both...

headline: Seaport Global Maintains Sell on NVIDIA (NVDA), Citing TPU Competition and Heavy Customer Commitments
summary: NVIDIA Corporation (NASDAQ:NVDA) is one of the Buzzing AI Stocks on Wall Street. On December 1, Seaport Global Securities analyst Jay Goldberg reiterated a “Sell” rating on the stock with a $140 price target. The firm has flagged competitive risks such as from Google’s TPUs as well as financial pressure rising from heavy customer investment commitments […]

headline: World shares are mixed as steady bond yields, rebound for bitcoin push US stocks higher
summary: European and Asian shares were mixed Wednesday after stocks on Wall Street held steadier as both bond yields and bitcoin stabilized.  In early European trading, Germany's DAX picked up 0.4% to 23,813.38, while the CAC 40 in Paris climbed 0.3% to 8,100.09.  Britain's FTSE 100 was unchanged at 9,702.28.

content.title: World shares are mixed as steady bond yields, rebound for bitcoin push US stocks higher
content.summary: European and Asian shares were mixed Wednesday after stocks on Wall Street held steadier as both bond yields and bitcoin stabilized.  In early European trading, Germany's DAX picked up 0.4% to 23,813.38, while the CAC 40 in Paris climbed 0.3% to 8,100.09.  Britain's FTSE 100 was unchanged at 9,702.28.

thumbnail.caption: A person on a bicycle waits in front of an electronic stock board showing Japan's Nikkei index at a securities firm Monday, Dec. 1, 2025, in Tokyo. (AP Photo/Eugene Hoshiko)
